code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(getResponseData);};export var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(getResponseData);};export var getContent=function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(getResponseData);};export var getResponseData=function getResponseData(res){return res.ok?res.json():res.json().then(function(res){Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.error===undefined?res.message:res.error));});};
